City Council
============

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Regular Meetings  * 7 p.m. * Second and fourth Monday of each month * City Hall Annex Building 401 E. San Patricio Avenue Mathis, TX78368 | Workshops  * Workshops are scheduled at the City Council’s request * City Hall Annex Building 401 E. San Patricio Avenue Mathis, TX 78368 |

City Council meetings are open to the public and citizens are encouraged to attend and participate in city government.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[Most Recent Agenda (PDF)](https://www.cityofmathis.com/AgendaCenter/MostRecent/City-Council-1-1 "Most Recent Agenda") | [View All Agendas and Minutes](https://www.cityofmathis.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-1 "View All Agendas and Minutes")

About the Council
-----------------

The City Council consists of a mayor and five council members elected by majority vote at large, each of which shall run for office in a numbered place position. The mayor and members of the city council shall be elected for terms of two years (odd and even numbered years) and shall hold office until their respective successors have been elected and qualified.

The council enacts policies, adopts ordinances and resolutions, and establishes the annual budget to provide services to the public. The mayor and council members are responsible for and require the city manager as the chief executive officer of the city to enforce all laws, federal, state, and municipal.
